forklift_sign.wrongAnswerDescription: Wrong, the forklift and transport vehicles danger sign is a yellow triangle with a black border and a black forklift.
forklift_sign.title: Forklift and transport vehicles
forklift_sign.description: This sign indicates danger of moving forklifts or transport vehicles. It means you have to take care to not be run over when walking.
forklift_sign.correctAnswerDescription: Correct, this sign indicates danger for moving forklifts and transport vehicles.

load_sign.wrongAnswerDescription: Wrong, the hanging loads danger sign is a yellow triangle with a black border and a black hanging box.
load_sign.title: Hanging loads
load_sign.description: This sign indicates danger for hanging or suspended loads. This can be for example trusses or fly bars.
load_sign.correctAnswerDescription: Correct, this sign indicates danger for hanging or suspended loads.

electricity_sign.wrongAnswerDescription: Wrong, the electricity danger sign is a yellow triangle with a black border and a black lightning bolt.
electricity_sign.title: Electricity danger
electricity_sign.description: This sign indicates danger for electricity. It means there are (touchable) electrical connections present. The sign is mostly combined with an indication of the tension.
electricity_sign.correctAnswerDescription: Correct, this sign indicates danger for electricity.

danger_sign.wrongAnswerDescription: Wrong, the general danger sign is a yellow triangle with a black border and a black exclamation mark.
danger_sign.title: General danger
danger_sign.description: This sign indicates a non-specified danger.
danger_sign.correctAnswerDescription: Correct, this sign indicates a general danger.
